member.summary: Length of the first region of the command

member.summary: Amount of invalid offline pin presentations this transaction

member.summary: Was the offline pin blocked at the last invalid presentation in this transaction?

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Commands.GocResponse.GOC_PINONL
member.summary: Was the Pin captured for online verification? If false GOC_PINBLK and GOC_KSN should be ignored.

member.summary: Key Serial Number of the Encrypted Pin, only if DUKPT was used as Key Management Method, otherwise this field is filled with zeros

member.summary: EMV data as Tag/Length/Value as requested from GOC_TAGS1 and GOC_TAGS2 if found and respecting requested order

member.summary: Length of the first region of the command

member.summary: Working key encrypted by MK if using MK as encryption

member.summary: Data to be captured Each entry is a Pin Capture and data will be returned concatenated By restriction of PCI the sum of GPN_MIN values cannot be lower than 4

member.summary: Length of the first region of the command

member.summary: Encrypted Pin Block containing the data from the GPN request concatenated

member.summary: Key Serial Number is DUKPT was used, for MK/WK this field is filled with zeros

member.summary: Length of the first region of the command

member.summary: Version of the EMV table from the requested Acquirer index If there was no table loaded for the requested acquirer index this field will be filled with zeros If the table was loaded without the generic index (0) and the requested index was generic this field will be filled with zeros

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Properties.VariableLengthProperty`1.LengthRatio
member.summary: Ratio of the length value Hexadecimal value's length are calculated with the bytes, so every 2 chars will be considered 1 byte and therefore a 16 char long string would have a length of 8, therefore it requires a ratio of 50% or 0.5

member.summary: Is the string property padded to fill the Max Length?

member.summary: Maximum Length of the property as string

member.name: M:Pinpad.Core.Tables.BaseTable.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor Starts the region TAB_LEN and does not close it

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.BaseTable.TAB_RECIDX
member.summary: EMV Table record index Each acquirer has it's own list, so you can have TAB_ACQ = 1 and TAB_RECIDX = 1 while using TAB_ACQ = 2 and TAB_RECIDX = 1 without conflict

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.BaseAidTable.T1_APPTYPE
member.summary: Application Type Free to use but commonly used as 1 for credit and 2 for debit

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.BaseAidTable.T1_DEFLABEL
member.summary: Default label for the application, in case the card doesn't have one Obsolete and unused since EMV 4.3. 16 chars long.

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.Tables.CapkTable
member.summary: Certification Authority Public Key table CAPKs are used by EMV cards for offline autentication and pin cryptography

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_APPVER1
member.summary: First option for terminal application version number If the application version at terminal does not match any of the terminal application versions the bit 8 of byte 2 from Terminal Verification Result will be set EMV TAG 9F09h

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_APPVER2
member.summary: Second option for terminal application version number If the application version at terminal does not match any of the terminal application versions the bit 8 of byte 2 from Terminal Verification Result will be set EMV TAG 9F09h

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_APPVER3
member.summary: Third option for terminal application version number If the application version at terminal does not match any of the terminal application versions the bit 8 of byte 2 from Terminal Verification Result will be set EMV TAG 9F09h

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_MERCHID
member.summary: Merchant Identifier EMV TAG 9F16h 15 chars long

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_MCC
member.summary: Merchant Category Code EMV TAG 9F15h 4 chars long

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_TRMID
member.summary: Terminal Identification EMV TAG 9F1Ch 8 chars long

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_TACDEF
member.summary: Terminal Action Code for Default Case The last TAC checked, if matched the transaction will be denied even if it could have been approved online.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_TACDEN
member.summary: Terminal Action Code for offline Denial The first TAC checked, if matched the transaction will be denied before going online.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_TACONL
member.summary: Terminal Action Code for online processing The second TAC checked, if matched the transaction may go online to authorize.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_FLRLIMIT
member.summary: Terminal Floor Limit Used to determine if the transaction should go online EMV TAG 9F1Bh

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSZEROAM
member.summary: Supports CTLS if the transaction value is zero?

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSCVMLIM
member.summary: Terminal Contactless Cardholder Verification Methods Required Limit

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSAPPVER
member.summary: PayPass Magnetic Stripe Application Version Number EMV TAG 9F6Dh

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_TDOLDEF
member.summary: Default Transaction Certificate Data Object List

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_DDOLDEF
member.summary: Default Dynamic Data Authentication Data Object List

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_ARCOFFLN
member.summary: Authorization Response Codes for offline transactions Obsolete and ignored since EMV 4, default is "Y1Z1Y3Z3"

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSTACDEF
member.summary: Contactless Terminal Action Code for Default Case The last TAC checked, if matched the transaction will be denied even if it could have been approved online.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSTACDEN
member.summary: Contactless Terminal Action Code for offline Denial The first TAC checked, if matched the transaction will be denied before going online.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.EmvAidTable.T1_CTLSTACONL
member.summary: Contactless Terminal Action Code for online processing The second TAC checked, if matched the transaction may go online to authorize.

member.name: P:Pinpad.Core.Tables.UnknownAidTable.T1_UNKDATA
member.summary: Contains unknown data from proprietary Aid patterns

member.summary: Separator used in the track data

member.summary: Separator used in the track data

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.ApplicationType
member.summary: Enumerator for the card applications, values are defined from GCR_CARDTYPE and AID's T1_ICCSTD values Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.ContactlessMode
member.summary: Enumerator for contactless modes to be used at AID table Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.EmvTableType
member.summary: Enumerator Emv Tables Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.FallbackStatus.FallbackUpToAcquirer
member.summary: Aplication required not supported, fallback depends on acquirer definitions

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.GkeActionCode
member.summary: Enumerator for GKE Actions Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.GkeActionCode.ReadKey
member.summary: Reads the next key in the buffer or waits for input

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.GkeActionCode.ReadKeyNoLight
member.summary: Reads the next key in the buffer or waits for input without the keyboard lights

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.OfflineTransactionStatus
member.summary: Enumerator for offline transaction status Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.OfflineTransactionStatus.Approved
member.summary: Transaction approved offline Even though the transaction was approved the acquirer still must be notified, this uses a different processing method since the transaction is actually approved

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode
member.summary: Enumerator for PRT actions Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode.Begin
member.summary: Clears the buffer and prepare to print

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode.End
member.summary: Print the data in the buffer and then clears the buffer

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode.AppendString
member.summary: Append a string to the print buffer

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode.AppendImage
member.summary: Append a image to the print buffer

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterActionCode.Step
member.summary: Adds to the vertifcal offset of the next buffer append

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterAlignmentCode
member.summary: Enumerator for PRT string alignment Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.PrinterStringSize
member.summary: Enumerator for PRT string font sizes Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1

member.name: T:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus
member.summary: PinPad command response status return codes enum Since undefined is 0 every value will be the actual code plus 1, example: ST_OK is "000", 0 + 1 = 1

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_NOSEC
member.summary: Attempt to use safe communication while it was not established

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_INVCALL
member.summary: Invalid call to function, previous operations are required, or unknown command

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CANCEL
member.summary: Operation was cancelled by the operator Cancel key was pressed

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_NOTOPEN
member.summary: PinPad was not open, OPN was not previously called

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_MANDAT
member.summary: A mandatory parameter was not sent

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_TABVERDIF
member.summary: EMV tables versions different than expected

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_TABERR
member.summary: Error writing tables, lack of space for example

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_INTERR
member.summary: Internal error, unexpected situation without a specific return code

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_ERRKEY
member.summary: Online pin key index is not present

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_NOCARD
member.summary: No card inserted or CTLS detected

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_PINBUSY
member.summary: Could not capture PIN temporarily for security reasons, for example: reached capture limit within a time inverval.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_NOSAM
member.summary: Secure Access Module (SAM) missing, mute or with communication error.

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CARDINVDATA
member.summary: Card contains invalid or inconsistent data

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CARDAPPNAV
member.summary: Card without EMV application available for the required conditions

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CARDAPPNAUT
member.summary: Selected EMV application may not be used in this situation

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_ERRFALLBACK
member.summary: High level EMC error passive of fallback to magnetic stripe

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CTLSSAPPNAV
member.summary: CTLS without application available for the required conditions

member.name: F:Pinpad.Core.TypeCode.AbecsResponseStatus.ST_CTLSSAPPNAUT
member.summary: CTLS selected application may not be used in this situation
